PE.evidence: There is no observation of the Indicator phenomenon.
PE.note: In Peru there are Chinese associations. However, they do not indicate being linked to the United World Chinese Association. The most notable associations are the Peruvian Chinese Association, Tung Sing Society, the Association of Chinese Companies in Peru and the Ton Huy Chong Koc Chinese Charity Central Society. The oldest associations are or were in the Chinatown, located in the Historic Center of Lima and a few blocks from the Government Palace and the Congress of the Republic.
PE.answerer: Answered by Jack Lo Lau and Jorge Jesús Chávez Ortíz, and has been reviewed by Team Fundación Andrés Bello - Centro de Investigación Chino Latinoamericano

VE.evidence: There is evidence about the existence of one organization called "Federación de Chinos de Ultramar en Venezuela" (Federation of Overseas Chinese People in Venezuela). Therefore, this indicator deserves a "Yes" response.
VE.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by Team Fundación Andrés Bello - Centro de Investigación Chino Latinoamericano

CL.evidence: Only a South American representative is listed in the official website. However, Chinese-Chilean associations are listed as part of the Joint committee of Global Chinese that supported Beijing's winter Olympics candidacy (2022) and as part of a congratulatory flyer issued to celebrate the return of Hong Kong to China in 2012. A paper published at the end of 2021 further explores these associations. Therefore, this indicator deserves a "Yes" response.
CL.note: The official website does not mention Chilean chapters but a South American chapter. Because of this, we didn't include this in the previous index. (http://www.uwca.net/member.html)
CL.answerer: Answered by Sascha Hannig Núñez, and has been reviewed by Team Fundación Andrés Bello - Centro de Investigación Chino Latinoamericano

GR.evidence: The Hellenic-Chinese Union for Economical Commercial and Cultural, is an association founded in Greece in 2007 and formally established in 2008. The Union aims at forming bilateral relations with Chinese organizations, like, among others, the United World Chinese Association. Given the eagerness of Chinese associations with world-wide activity to include local unions and groups, it would be safe to suggest that the Hellenic-Chinese Union for Economical Commercial and Cultural is a member of United World Chinese Association. Nevertheless, there is lack of sufficient evidence and noticable activity on behalf of the Hellenic-Chinese Union since 2014. Therefore, a definite answer to this Indicator cannot be provided.
GR.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

PL.evidence:
Operating in Poland organization haven not been listed as UWCA members. They cannot be also linked to UWCA European branch or personally to its head 江基民. 
https://archive.ph/0Aud7 
but there are organizations linked to 世界华侨华人社团联谊大会 via European Branch :
https://archive.ph/E1oxt 
Combined with: https://archive.ph/WCWeO
PL.note: Chinese diaspora organizations operating in Poland can be linked to another PRC controlled international network: 世界华侨华人社团联谊大会 There are also other operating in Poland diaspora organizations linked to other PRC controlled networks. If the question cover organizations similar to UWCA then the answer would be “YES”
PL.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

VN.evidence: I discovered that the Unity Of Businessman Division, which is affiliated, is part of the United World Chinese Association. The Unity of Businessmen Division in Vietnam is included in the organization's membership.
VN.note:
"I find the supporting evidence different from the expert.
An organization called “世界越棉寮华人中国和平统一促进会(World Vietnam-Cambodia-Laos Chinese Association for the Promotion of Peaceful Reunification of China)” exists.
https://www.huaxia.com/c/2023/08/10/1756997.shtml
http://melbourne.china-consulate.gov.cn/chn/zqqq/201702/t20170214_140830.htm"		

Thank you, we can change the grading to "Yes"
